attributes.action: Require faith healers of all religious denominations and sects to present evidence of the efficacy of their prayers before they are allowed to hold their healing meetings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to protect people of religious faith from being misled by individuals who claim to have healing powers, but do not. Medical evidence of conditions improving after prayer or other forms of spiritual treatment without any known natural explanation for this should be made available first if faith healers wish to hold their meetings and 'crusades'.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
